00019 #include "FFTProcessor/Action.hpp"
00020 #include "FFTProcessor/Action/Calibrator.hpp"
00021 #include "FFTProcessor/Action/FindPeak.hpp"
00022 #include "FFTProcessor/Action/AverageDensity.hpp"
00023 #include "FFTProcessor/Action/PhaseDifferentiation.hpp"
00024 #include "FFTProcessor/Action/FSKStrength.hpp"
00025 
00026 #include "logging.hpp"
00027 
00028 namespace Action {
00029   Handle Factory::makeAction(std::string name,
00030                              const boost::property_tree::ptree& pt) {
00031     if (name == "FindPeak")
00032       return Handle(new FindPeak(pt));
00033     if (name == "Calibrator")
00034       return Handle(new Calibrator(pt));
00035     if (name == "AverageDensity")
00036       return Handle(new AverageDensity(pt));
00037     if (name == "PhaseDifferentiation")
00038       return Handle(new PhaseDifferentiation(pt));
00039     if (name == "FSKStrength")
00040       return Handle(new FSKStrength(pt));
00041     else
00042       throw std::runtime_error(THROW_SITE_INFO(name+": action not supported"));
00043   }
00044 } // namespace Action
